MongoDB | New York, NY | Lead Engineer | On-site | Full-Time

We are looking to a hire a either a Lead Software Engineer or Senior Staff to work on our newest "Backend as a Service" offering, Stitch. This service is very similar to other large BaaS vendors but Stitch uses rule based access to third party services rather then locking you in to a specific ecosystem.

We are looking for someone that can really focus on scaling Stitch (getting change feeds to scale across all usages), and build features around realtime database access as well as functionality to enable users to work on MongoDB natively from mobile platforms.

Apply here: https://grnh.se/4d483a591
